Address.label: Address
Address.value: 350 CAMINO DE LA REINA,SUITE 100, SAN DIEGO, California, 92108, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Encore Capital Group Inc is a specialty finance company. It provides debt recovery solutions for consumers and property owners across a broad range of financial assets. The company purchase portfolios of defaulted consumer receivables at deep discounts to face value and manage them by working with individuals as they repay their obligations and work toward financial recovery. Encore has only a reportable segment being portfolio purchasing and recovery.

value.name: Monique Dumais-Chrisope
value.title: Chief Information Officer & Senior Vice President
